overview: Regional Manager, Steve, thinks he's the coolest, sexiest boss ever. His co-worker Tim lusts after hot receptionist Patti when he's not sabotaging his cube-mate, the know-it-all ice queen Darla. The office is shaken up when Steve decides to hire a gorgeous new secretary played by Tera Wray, and as the interviews begin, office politics turns to sexual politics...
title: The orifice
